On Apr 26, 2004, at 8:35 AM, Kenshi Zey wrote:

> i've been checking out the maps on the samurai archives website and i 
> wondered whether anyone knows the geographical location of the taira 
> clan.what i mean is where exactly was the head of the clan located on 
> the map of japan.i admit that i don't know much about japan's 
> geography and studying the map of old japan's provinces didn't 
> help.can anyone comment on this?

Well, to make a long story short, at the peak of their power their 
headquarter was at Rokuhara, in Kyoto (aka Heiankyo, Miyako, etc., 
depending on the period and the map) on the East banks of the Kamo 
river.
cepo
